title: BOOK DIRECT & RECEIVE UP TO $200
seo_title: NYC Stay Hotel Package | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: Receive a $25 American Express Card per night, up to $200 per stay when you book direct at The Frederick Hotel

banner_image.name: Frederick_hero
banner_image.caption: Deals at The Frederick Hotel
banner_image.description: Receive a $25 American Express Card per night,

description: When you book directly with The Frederick Hotel, we’ll give you a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200. Treat yourself while you’re in NYC – grab a special meal or a few drinks in the greatest city in the world.
